Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\security\auth_test.go:433:50: SA1029: should not use built-in type string as key for value; define your own type to avoid collisions (staticcheck)
internal\security\auth_test.go:452:50: SA1029: should not use built-in type string as key for value; define your own type to avoid collisions (staticcheck)
